body:
One potential way to have somewhat balanced multiplayer with all the new powerful abilities I want to add (climb, fly, grapple, jet-boots etc.) is to limit the number of them a player can use at once. Have players create an individual loadout of moves, like in God Hand.

Make it an optional mode, for the full power fantasy a player should be able to acquire everything.

This would also enable an additional simpler(?) way of inputting these controls, by allowing each loadout slot to be bound to a corresponding key/button. This might be controller friendly?
title: choose-your-own-moveset
